question: What is “Kharmor “?
option1: A rare / endangered animal found in some parts of north east India
option2: A rare / endangered bird found predominantly in Madhya Pradesh
option3: A species of fresh water mollusk
option4: An species of a rare plant found in Himalayas
answer: A rare / endangered bird found predominantly in Madhya Pradesh
explanation: The lesser florican is also known as the likh or kharmore. It is the smallest in bustard family. It is endemic to the Indian Subcontinent found predominantly in Madhya Pradesh. Scientific name- Sypheotides indicus, Rank- Species, Family- Otididae, Phylum- Chordata.
